program.name: procmail
program.configure:
# disable flock() on Redhat Linux case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-linux*) ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!^/\*#define NO_flock_LOCK!#define NO_flock_LOCK!" config.h ;; esac
gmake CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS0="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ BASENAME=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} LOCKINGTEST="/var/tmp . /opt/src/utilities" \ LIBPATHS="${LIBPATHS:-/lib /usr/lib}" \ ${SEARCHLIBS+SEARCHLIBS=${SEARCHLIBS}} autoconf.h
program.install: gmake BASENAME=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} install gmake BASENAME=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} install-suid

item.para: Add support for AIX 5.1 (same as AIX 4)
